topic.title: Scottish Independence
topic.body:
Time to remove the British from Scotland. 
The Brit government censors and controls all news media and manipulates all social media.
Decentralized internet, blogging and social media is Scotland's only hope.

topic.title: Scottish cannon fodder wanted
topic.body:
British Military recruiters disproportionately targeting Scottish schools – petition — RT UK News https://www.rt.com/uk/359331-scottish-schools-military-petition/

Meanwhile in London Ben and Jerry's adverts banned for being too close to a school https://metro.co.uk/2019/06/19/ben-jerrys-adverts-banned-close-school-10011293/?ito=article.desktop.share.top.twitter

topic.title: BBC should be closed immediately
topic.body: British State Propaganda channel, that forces viewers to pay for the lies.
